artist: Artist: Natori Shunsen; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: head and shoulders of scowling old man with white hair, wearing yellow, orange, white, black and blue garments; black ground
markings: red artist\'s seal: 春仙 {Shun Sen}; publisher seal: 渡辺工 {Watanabe kō} (work of Watanabe); LRC, artist\'s hand-applied red approval seal: 名取 {Natori}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Creative Prints: Collected Portraits by Shunsen (Sōsaku hanga: Shunsen nigao-e shū 創作版画　春仙似顔画集)
text: Fifth design of a set of 36. Based on Onoe Matsusuke IV (1843-1928) as Nozarashi Kohei in the scene Yatsuyamashita nami uchigiwa of the play Imashimegusa susuki no nozarashi 誡種芒野晒　八ツ山下浪打際, performed at the Ichimura Theater, November 1915.
title: Actor Onoe Matsusuke IV as Kohei
